mapper.insert: insert into tb_userinfo (loginID, password, name, user_type, email, email_cop, area, tel1, tel2, tel3, birthday, sex, career_year, career_mm, skill_add, singular_facts, user_position, consult_yn, salary, join_date, title, grade, comp_area1, comp_area2, comp_area3, career_contents) VALUES (#{loginID}, #{password}, #{name}, #{user_type}, #{email}, #{email_cop}, #{area}, #{tel1}, #{tel2}, #{tel3}, #{birthday}, #{sex}, #{career_year}, #{career_mm}, #{skill_add}, #{singular_facts}, #{user_position}, #{consult_yn}, #{salary}, #{join_date}, #{title}, #{grade}, #{comp_area1}, #{comp_area2}, #{comp_area3}, #{career_contents})

insert into TB_USERSKILL ( skill_code, skill_detail, loginID)
VALUES (#{skill_code}, #{skill_detail}, #{loginID})

insert into tb_userinfo (loginID, password, user_type, comp_name, birthday, email, email_cop, mgr_name, mgr_tel1, mgr_tel2, mgr_tel3, comp_info)
VALUES(#{loginID}, #{password}, #{user_type}, #{comp_name}, #{birthday}, #{email}, #{email_cop}, #{mgr_name}, #{mgr_tel1}, #{mgr_tel2}, #{mgr_tel3}, #{comp_info})
mapper.select: select loginID as loginId, password, user_email from tb_userinfo where user_email = #{user_email}
select loginID as loginId, password, user_email from tb_userinfo where user_email = #{user_email} and loginID = #{loginId}
select count(*) loginID from tb_userinfo where loginID = #{loginId}
